Posts.Content: Jul 19, 2018 06:35AM SHAR01 wrote: Good day I had a memogram and ultra sound done 2 years ago. after feeling a lump the memogram and ultrasound could not pick up anything. yesterday I went for my second. they found lumps in both my breast and said I must come back in 6 months for and ultrasound only to see if its bigger. I am 40 and my breast are growing. I told the tech that she just looked at me. I need to take my results to my gp. I am concern because it wasn't seen 2 years ago on the mem test.. but now it's seen and because my first one showed clear they have nothing to compare it with. I don't know what to do.
Posts.Title: Enlarged breast with cysts Smoo Bostoniangal25
